Tail: G-EUPS
Livery: BA standard
Route: INV-LHR
Weather on Departure: Overcast, winds 20kts
Weather on Arrival: Overcast, winds 30kts
Airborne Time: 1h16m
Miles: 442
Remarks: None


Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! 

Join me on a short UK Domestic flight with British Airways. Enjoy all the usual features of my trip reports, especially the surprisingly pleasant Aspire lounge at Inverness. 

The Highlands are a beautiful area of Scotland - why not visit one day? Flights and trains are cheap...
